committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

official_title: To provide dollars to the classroom.

summary.text: Dollars to the Classroom Act - Requires at least 95% of any federal funds made available to a state by the Secretary of Education for elementary or secondary education to be used: (1) for academic and classroom or classroom-related purposes, or (2) at the elementary or secondary school level.

titles.title: To provide dollars to the classroom.
